knowYourSize.description: Why choose randomly? With us, you can easily know your ideal size based on your weight, to feel comfortable and elegant at the same time.

size.title: Choose your size with confidence
size.subtitle: Follow the size guide for ideal comfort and elegance. All you have to do is accurately measure your chest and hip circumference, and we will tell you your suitable size.
size.importantNote: Important note: It is preferable to use a fabric measuring tape, and that the measurement process is done while you are wearing light clothing to get an accurate result.
size.chestInstructions: Wrap the measuring tape around the fullest part of your chest (usually directly above the nipples). Make sure the tape is straight and not too tight or loose. Keep the tape parallel to the floor.
size.hipInstructions: Wrap the measuring tape around the widest part of your hips (upper hip). Make sure the tape completely surrounds you horizontally and evenly. Do not pull the tape too tight.
size.tips: It is preferable to take measurements twice to ensure accuracy. If your measurements fall between two sizes, we recommend choosing the larger size for more comfort. You can ask another person to help you with the measurement for a more accurate result.

validation.invalidChest: Please enter a valid chest measurement
validation.invalidHip: Please enter a valid hip measurement

about.title: About Us

hero.title: Elegance, Modesty, and Comfort — Since 2021
hero.description: We blend contemporary Turkish design with high–quality fabrics to create modest fashion that celebrates your elegance every day.

about.whoWeAreText: Founded in 2021, Wahat Al Zain serves modest women aged 18–55 who appreciate a refined, contemporary outlook. Over five years, our diverse collections have earned a loyal community that trusts us to deliver modesty, quality, and modern design. We seamlessly combine the latest trends with comfort for women who see the world through elegance and modesty.
about.presenceText: Wahat Al Zain has become a trusted brand and a key destination for veiled women in the UAE, with a strong presence across the community and branches in Sharjah and Abu Dhabi under direct management.
about.offeringsText: Discover a curated range: blazers, tracksuits, dresses, burkinis, abayas, khimar, prayer sets, and plus–size options. Our designs feature high–quality materials and vibrant colors, thoughtfully crafted for modest comfort and contemporary taste.

contact.title: Our Locations & Contact Information
contact.subtitle: Visit us at our branches or get in touch with us

size-guide.title: Size Guide
size-guide.instruction-2: Measure your chest at the fullest part
size-guide.instruction-3: Measure your hips at the widest part
size-guide.instruction-4: Keep the tape measure parallel to the ground
size-guide.tips-content: If you're between sizes, we recommend choosing the larger size for comfort. All our garments are designed with modest fit in mind.
